summary: Your glass armor will be more quality textures and colors.
descriptionHtml:
Hello guys this mod was made for a request. 

[center][i]\"I don\'t like using enb when I introduce a mod. So I\'m sory if you wait for pictures with enb\"[/i][/center]

Glass Armor Retexture and Recolor by savalera. I hope you like it. ?t is darker glass armor. 
Male and Female. Male version may be bad than female version because it was fast job.

Installation

Actually this is simple installation. Only extract the textures file to your Skyrim/Data folder. Enjoy
author: Savalera
